name: snoscan2bsml
synopsis: USAGE: snoscan2bsml.pl --input=/path/to/snoscanfile --output=/path/to/output.bsml [ --project=projectName --class=class of sequence --degug=integer(level of debug) --fasta_file=input file to snoscan ]

options.description: Input file from the snoscan search.
This is used by the workflow (for Id purporses)
Project ID. Used in creating feature IDs. Defaults to unknown if not passed.
The command passed in from the workflow
Debug level. Use a large number to turn on verbose debugging.
